channel.title: CVE Feed for silabs.com -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for silabs.com -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32097|2024-08-02T15:03:29.137Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_crypto_transparent_aead_decrypt_tag
in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-1262|2024-08-02T05:40:59.829Z -- silabs.com -- wi-sun%20linux%20border%20router
item.description: Missing MAC layer security in Silicon Labs Wi-SUN Linux Border Router v1.5.2 and earlier allows malicious node to route malicious messages through network.

item.title: CVE-2023-32098|2024-08-02T15:03:29.024Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_se_sign_message
in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-41096|2024-08-02T18:46:11.828Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description:
Missing Encryption of Security Keys vulnerability in Silicon Labs Ember ZNet SDK on 32 bit, ARM (SecureVault High modules) allows potential modification or extraction of network credentials stored in flash.
This issue affects Silicon Labs Ember ZNet SDK: 7.3.1 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-2747|2024-08-02T06:33:05.305Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: The initialization vector (IV) used by the secure engine (SE) for encrypting data stored in the SE flash memory is uninitialized.

item.title: CVE-2023-51392|2024-08-02T22:32:09.157Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Ember ZNet between v7.2.0 and v7.4.0 used software AES-CCM instead of integrated hardware cryptographic accelerators, potentially increasing risk of electromagnetic and differential power analysis sidechannel attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-2683|2024-08-02T06:33:04.563Z -- silabs.com -- bluetooth%20sdk
item.description: A memory leak in the EFR32 Bluetooth LE stack 5.1.0 through 5.1.1 allows an attacker to send an invalid pairing message and cause future legitimate connection attempts to fail. A reset of the device immediately clears the error.

item.title: CVE-2023-2687|2024-08-02T06:33:04.403Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20sdk
item.description: Buffer overflow in Platform CLI component in Silicon Labs Gecko SDK v4.2.1 and earlier allows user to overwrite limited structures on the heap.

item.title: CVE-2023-0775|2024-08-02T05:24:33.854Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: An invalid ‘prepare write request’ command can cause the Bluetooth LE stack to run out of memory and fail to be able to handle subsequent connection requests, resulting in a denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2023-5138|2024-08-02T07:52:06.704Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: Glitch detection is not enabled by default for the CortexM33 core in Silicon Labs secure vault high parts EFx32xG2xB, except EFR32xG21B.

item.title: CVE-2023-6387|2024-08-02T08:28:21.861Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: A potential buffer overflow exists in the Bluetooth LE HCI CPC sample application in the Gecko SDK which may result in a denial of service or remote code execution

item.title: CVE-2023-3488|2024-08-02T06:55:03.619Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20bootloader
item.description: Uninitialized buffer in GBL parser in Silicon Labs GSDK v4.3.0 and earlier allows attacker to leak data from Secure stack via malformed GBL file.

item.title: CVE-2023-32096|2024-08-02T15:03:29.019Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_crypto_transparent_aead_encrypt_tag
in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-51394|2024-08-02T22:32:09.448Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: High traffic environments may result in NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in Silicon Labs's Ember ZNet SDK before v7.4.0, causing a system crash.

item.title: CVE-2023-2481|2024-08-02T06:26:09.708Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_se_opaque_import_key
in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-3024|2024-08-02T06:41:04.135Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: Forcing the Bluetooth LE stack to segment 'prepare write response' packets can lead to an out-of-bounds memory access.

item.title: CVE-2023-32099|2024-08-02T15:03:29.184Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_se_sign_hash in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-1132|2024-08-02T05:32:46.387Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_se_driver_key_agreement
in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-1261|2024-08-02T05:40:59.802Z -- silabs.com -- wi-sun%20sdk
item.description: Missing MAC layer security in Silicon Labs Wi-SUN SDK v1.5.0 and earlier allows malicious node to route malicious messages through network.

item.title: CVE-2023-41097|2024-08-02T18:46:11.874Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: An Observable Timing Discrepancy, Covert Timing Channel vulnerability in Silabs GSDK on ARM potentially allows Padding Oracle Crypto Attack on CBC PKCS7.This issue affects GSDK: through 4.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-3487|2024-08-02T06:55:03.656Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: An integer overflow in Silicon Labs Gecko Bootloader version 4.3.1 and earlier allows unbounded memory access when reading from or writing to storage slots.

item.title: CVE-2023-4020|2024-08-02T07:17:11.417Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: An unvalidated input in a library function responsible for communicating between secure and non-secure memory in Silicon Labs TrustZone implementation allows reading/writing of memory in the secure region of memory from the non-secure region of memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-4280|2024-08-02T07:24:04.329Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: An unvalidated input in Silicon Labs TrustZone implementation in v4.3.x and earlier of the Gecko SDK allows an attacker to access the trusted region of memory from the untrusted region.

item.title: CVE-2023-51393|2024-08-02T22:32:09.194Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Due to an allocation of resources without limits, an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability exists in Silicon Labs Ember ZNet SDK prior to v7.4.0.0 (delivered as part of Silicon Labs Gecko SDK v4.4.0) which may enable attackers to trigger a bus fault and crash of the device, requiring a reboot in order to rejoin the network.

item.title: CVE-2023-2686|2024-08-02T06:33:04.000Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description: Buffer overflow in Wi-Fi Commissioning MicriumOS example in Silicon Labs Gecko SDK v4.2.3 or earlier allows connected device to write payload onto the stack.

item.title: CVE-2023-32100|2024-08-02T15:03:29.161Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description:
Compiler removal of buffer clearing in
sli_se_driver_mac_compute
in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-41095|2024-08-02T18:46:11.821Z -- silabs.com -- openthread%20sdk
item.description: Missing Encryption of Security Keys vulnerability in Silicon Labs OpenThread SDK on 32 bit, ARM (SecureVault High modules) allows potential modification or extraction of network credentials stored in flash. This issue affects Silicon Labs OpenThread SDK: 2.3.1 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-5310|2024-08-02T07:52:08.559Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20sdk
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in all Silicon Labs Z-Wave controller and endpoint devices running Z-Wave SDK v7.20.3 (Gecko SDK v4.3.3) and earlier. This attack can be carried out only by devices on the network sending a stream of packets to the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-4489|2024-08-02T07:31:05.899Z -- silabs.com -- z%2Fip%20gateway%20sdk
item.description: The first S0 encryption key is generated with an uninitialized PRNG in Z/IP Gateway products running Silicon Labs Z/IP Gateway SDK v7.18.3 and earlier. This makes the first S0 key generated at startup predictable, potentially allowing network key prediction and unauthorized S0 network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-0965|2024-08-02T05:32:46.274Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description: Compiler removal of buffer clearing in sli_cryptoacc_transparent_key_agreement in Silicon Labs Gecko Platform SDK v4.2.1 and earlier results in key material duplication to RAM.

item.title: CVE-2023-6874|2024-08-02T08:42:08.108Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: Prior to v7.4.0, Ember ZNet is vulnerable to a denial of service attack through manipulation of the NWK sequence number

item.title: CVE-2023-6640|2024-08-02T08:35:14.885Z -- silabs.com -- pc%20controller
item.description: Malformed S2 Nonce Get Command Class packets can be sent to crash PC Controller v5.54.0 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-6533|2024-08-02T08:35:14.652Z -- silabs.com -- pc%20controller
item.description: Malformed Device Reset Locally Command Class packets can be sent to the controller, causing the controller to assume the end device has left the network. After this, frames sent by the end device will not be acknowledged by the controller. This vulnerability exists in PC Controller v5.54.0, and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2024-22473|2024-08-01T22:51:09.859Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: TRNG is used before initialization by ECDSA signing driver when exiting EM2/EM3 on Virtual Secure Vault (VSE) devices. This defect may allow Signature Spoofing by Key Recreation.This issue affects Gecko SDK through v4.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-3051|2024-08-01T19:32:42.626Z -- silabs.com -- z%2Fip%20gateway%20sdk
item.description: Malformed Device Reset Locally command classes can be sent to temporarily deny service to an end device. Any frames sent by the end device will not be acknowledged by the gateway during this time.

item.title: CVE-2024-3052|2024-08-01T19:32:42.571Z -- silabs.com -- z%2Fip%20gateway%20sdk
item.description: Malformed S2 Nonce Get command classes can be sent to crash the gateway. A hard reset is required to recover the gateway.

item.title: CVE-2024-3017|2024-08-01T19:32:42.527Z -- silabs.com -- sisdk
item.description:
In a
Silicon Labs multi-protocol gateway, a corrupt pointer to buffered data on a multi-protocol radio co-processor (RCP) causes the OpenThread Border Router(OTBR) application task running on the host platform to crash, allowing an attacker to cause a temporary denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2024-3043|2024-08-01T19:32:42.579Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: An unauthenticated IEEE 802.15.4 'co-ordinator realignment' packet can be used to force Zigbee nodes to change their network identifier (pan ID), leading to a denial of service. This packet type is not useful in production and should be used only for PHY qualification.

item.title: CVE-2024-3017|2024-07-30T14:49:48.889Z -- silabs.com -- sisdk
item.description:
In a
Silicon Labs multi-protocol gateway, a corrupt pointer to buffered data on a multi-protocol radio co-processor (RCP) causes the OpenThread Border Router(OTBR) application task running on the host platform to crash, allowing an attacker to cause a temporary denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2023-51393|2024-07-25T17:58:44.231Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Due to an allocation of resources without limits, an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability exists in Silicon Labs Ember ZNet SDK prior to v7.4.0.0 (delivered as part of Silicon Labs Gecko SDK v4.4.0) which may enable attackers to trigger a bus fault and crash of the device, requiring a reboot in order to rejoin the network.

item.title: CVE-2023-6874|2024-06-28T17:48:00.169Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: Prior to v7.4.0, Ember ZNet is vulnerable to a denial of service attack through manipulation of the NWK sequence number

item.title: CVE-2024-3043|2024-06-27T18:17:15.392Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: An unauthenticated IEEE 802.15.4 'co-ordinator realignment' packet can be used to force Zigbee nodes to change their network identifier (pan ID), leading to a denial of service. This packet type is not useful in production and should be used only for PHY qualification.

item.title: CVE-2024-3017|2024-06-27T18:35:26.344Z -- silabs.com -- sisdk
item.description:
In a
Silicon Labs multi-protocol gateway, a corrupt pointer to buffered data on a multi-protocol radio co-processor (RCP) causes the OpenThread Border Router(OTBR) application task running on the host platform to crash, allowing an attacker to cause a temporary denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2024-3051|2024-06-04T17:31:05.004Z -- silabs.com -- z%2Fip%20gateway%20sdk
item.description: Malformed Device Reset Locally command classes can be sent to temporarily deny service to an end device. Any frames sent by the end device will not be acknowledged by the gateway during this time.

item.title: CVE-2024-3052|2024-06-04T17:33:21.815Z -- silabs.com -- z%2Fip%20gateway%20sdk
item.description: Malformed S2 Nonce Get command classes can be sent to crash the gateway. A hard reset is required to recover the gateway.

item.title: CVE-2024-22473|2024-02-21T18:13:10.241Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: TRNG is used before initialization by ECDSA signing driver when exiting EM2/EM3 on Virtual Secure Vault (VSE) devices. This defect may allow Signature Spoofing by Key Recreation.This issue affects Gecko SDK through v4.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-4013|2024-06-07T19:26:14.015Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20sdk
item.description: A bug exists in the API, mesh_node_power_off(), which fails to copy the contents of the Replay Protection List (RPL) from RAM to NVM before powering down, resulting in the ability to replay unsaved messages. Note that as of June 2024, the Gecko SDK was renamed to the Simplicity SDK, and the versioning scheme was changed from Gecko SDK vX.Y.Z to Simplicity SDK YYYY.MM.Patch#.

item.title: CVE-2024-0240|2024-06-04T17:58:19.959Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: A memory leak in the Silicon Labs' Bluetooth stack for EFR32 products may cause memory to be exhausted when sending notifications to multiple clients, this results in all Bluetooth operations, such as advertising and scanning, to stop.

item.title: CVE-2023-6874|2024-02-05T17:39:49.262Z -- silabs.com -- gsdk
item.description: Prior to v7.4.0, Ember ZNet is vulnerable to a denial of service attack through manipulation of the NWK sequence number

item.title: CVE-2023-6533|2024-02-21T19:55:26.586Z -- silabs.com -- pc%20controller
item.description: Malformed Device Reset Locally Command Class packets can be sent to the controller, causing the controller to assume the end device has left the network. After this, frames sent by the end device will not be acknowledged by the controller. This vulnerability exists in PC Controller v5.54.0, and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-6640|2024-06-04T17:17:13.416Z -- silabs.com -- pc%20controller
item.description: Malformed S2 Nonce Get Command Class packets can be sent to crash PC Controller v5.54.0 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-51392|2024-02-23T16:12:41.261Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Ember ZNet between v7.2.0 and v7.4.0 used software AES-CCM instead of integrated hardware cryptographic accelerators, potentially increasing risk of electromagnetic and differential power analysis sidechannel attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-51393|2024-02-23T19:14:23.817Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: Due to an allocation of resources without limits, an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability exists in Silicon Labs Ember ZNet SDK prior to v7.4.0.0 (delivered as part of Silicon Labs Gecko SDK v4.4.0) which may enable attackers to trigger a bus fault and crash of the device, requiring a reboot in order to rejoin the network.

item.title: CVE-2023-51394|2024-02-23T19:13:37.199Z -- silabs.com -- ember%20znet%20sdk
item.description: High traffic environments may result in NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in Silicon Labs's Ember ZNet SDK before v7.4.0, causing a system crash.

item.description: An unauthenticated IEEE 802.15.4 'co-ordinator realignment' packet can be used to force Zigbee nodes to change their network identifier (pan ID), leading to a denial of service. This packet type is not useful in production and should be used only for PHY qualification.

item.description: TRNG is used before initialization by ECDSA signing driver when exiting EM2/EM3 on Virtual Secure Vault (VSE) devices. This defect may allow Signature Spoofing by Key Recreation.This issue affects Gecko SDK through v4.4.0.

item.description: Malformed Device Reset Locally Command Class packets can be sent to the controller, causing the controller to assume the end device has left the network. After this, frames sent by the end device will not be acknowledged by the controller. This vulnerability exists in PC Controller v5.54.0, and earlier.

item.description: Ember ZNet between v7.2.0 and v7.4.0 used software AES-CCM instead of integrated hardware cryptographic accelerators, potentially increasing risk of electromagnetic and differential power analysis sidechannel attacks.

item.description: A memory leak in the Silicon Labs' Bluetooth stack for EFR32 products may cause memory to be exhausted when sending notifications to multiple clients, this results in all Bluetooth operations, such as advertising and scanning, to stop.

item.description: A bug exists in the API, mesh_node_power_off(), which fails to copy the contents of the Replay Protection List (RPL) from RAM to NVM before powering down, resulting in the ability to replay unsaved messages. Note that as of June 2024, the Gecko SDK was renamed to the Simplicity SDK, and the versioning scheme was changed from Gecko SDK vX.Y.Z to Simplicity SDK YYYY.MM.Patch#.
